nodes.text: The IR-89 Armored Assault Droid was a model of three-legged battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. IR-89 Armored Assault Droids were among the forces that defended the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

IR-89 Armored Assault Droids appear as enemies in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
